title: I HAVE 420 LOUD, DRINKS AND A NICE CRIB..SEEKING A COOL GIRL
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hey cool guy here, just looking for a cool girl to come over or I pick up to chill and get to know a laidback guy. Ideally looking for a female that is hwp ... smoke n drink and just wanna chill out and talk about life? What's your favorite movie? I have all the channels on a big screen tv... I live alone so no nosey roommates... email me and tell me about yourself, your height, age, race... I would like for any girl that is interested to please send a few pics in the first email and I will send a few of mine.. Please be clean, std free... Even though we will just be chillin.. I am not bad looking, you will get my pics and see for yourself.. Well hope to meet a nice girl..
Snapchat: Ashworth143
